title: Woman With Veil Light Skin Tone
description: A woman wearing a veil, often associated with weddings or religious ceremonies, depicted with a light skin tone.
apple_vendor_description: The woman with veil emoji, as seen on Apple devices, presents a graceful figure with a luminous, light skin tone, adorned by a delicate, translucent veil that drapes softly. Apple‚Äôs signature 3D shading and smooth gradients create a sense of ethereal beauty and refined elegance, with gentle highlights emphasizing the subtle contours of her face.
